summary: A documentary on the Black Bear Ranch Commune, an alternative living community founded in 1968 in the remote North Californian wilderness.
cast: Mahaj Seeger|Peter Coyote|Cedar Seeger|Mel Kramer|Elsa Marley|Michael Tierra|Richard Marley|Larry Bacon|Hoss Bennett|Creek Hanauer|Harriet Beinfeld|Martin Linhart|Peter Leaf|Osha Neumann|Kenoli Oleari|Efrem Korngold|Catherine Guerra|Geba Greenberg|Tesilya Hanauer|Allegra Brucker|Aaron Marley|Gridley Wright|Dameru|Wakan|Natek
title: Commune
